column2: Florence Nightingale Letters at the Clendening Library :
column3: Letter to Alice Hepworth .Dated March 9, 1886 .Page 8 of 14. . . . . .- it was brought in cursing .& swearing - [it had never .heard a good word in all .its life.] with an abscess .in its back - about a year .ago. It can only just .stand no...
